An answer to the late K. James's last declaration, dated at St. Germains, April 17. s.n. 1693 Welwood, James, 1652-1727. Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
[2], 40 p.
Printed for Richard Baldwin ..., London : 1693.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Attributed to James Wellwood. cf. NUC pre-1956. Also attributed to Daniel Defoe. cf. Moore, J.R. : A checklist of the writings of Daniel Defoe.
